breakfast.name: Big breakfast
breakfast.details: 4 whole eggs + 3 rashers bacon + 2 slices wholegrain toast + butter + 150g baked beans

lunch.name: Chicken & rice bowl
lunch.details: 250g chicken breast + 160g rice + mixed veg + 20ml olive oil + 50g hummus + avocado

dinner.name: Beef stir fry
dinner.details: 250g lean beef mince + 250g egg noodles + stir fry veg + soy sauce + sesame oil + side rice

breakfast.name: Omelette feast
breakfast.details: 5 whole eggs + 60g cheese + spinach + mushrooms + 2 slices toast + butter

lunch.name: Turkey mince bowl
lunch.details: 250g turkey mince + 350g sweet potato + green beans + salsa + sour cream + cheese + tortilla chips

dinner.name: Salmon & potatoes
dinner.details: 250g salmon fillet + 350g baby potatoes + broccoli + butter + side salad with dressing + bread roll

snack.name: Mega smoothie + apple
snack.details: 2 bananas + 60g oats + 400ml milk + 1.5 scoop whey + 30g peanut butter + apple

breakfast.name: Fried eggs + full sides
breakfast.details: 5 whole eggs + 180g baked beans + 2 slices toast + 2 rashers bacon

lunch.name: Double chicken wrap
lunch.details: 2 medium wraps + 220g chicken + salad + 60g hummus + feta + avocado + cheese

dinner.name: Lean beef pasta
dinner.details: 250g lean beef mince + 160g pasta + tomato sauce + parmesan + 2 garlic bread slices + side salad

snack.name: Mass gainer smoothie
snack.details: 3 bananas + 80g oats + 400ml milk + 2 scoops whey + 40g peanut butter

proteins: Eggs - 18, Chicken breast - 470g, Lean beef mince (5% fat) - 500g, Turkey mince - 250g, Salmon fillet - 250g, Bacon - 7 rashers, Greek yogurt - 150g, Whey protein - 7 scoops
carbs: Wholegrain bread - 10 slices, Rice - 180g (dry), Egg noodles - 250g, Pasta - 160g (dry), Sweet potato - 350g, Baby potatoes - 350g, Large wraps - 2, Baked beans - 330g, Oats - 140g, Garlic bread - 2 portions, Tortilla chips - small bag, Bread roll - 1
fats: Avocado - 2 medium, Cheese - 100g, Almonds - 40g, Peanut butter - 70g, Hummus - 110g, Feta - small amount, Sour cream - small amount, Butter - 40g, Olive oil - small bottle, Sesame oil - small bottle, Whole milk - 1.5 litres, Honey - small jar, Protein bar (25g) - 1
produce: Bananas - 10, Apples - 2, Tomatoes - 1, Spinach mushrooms broccoli green beans stir fry veg salad, Salad dressing - small bottle
pantry: Soy sauce, Tomato pasta sauce - 1 jar
